name: The World of iZ
description: "The World Of iZ", a third person action-adventure game, where the player takes over the role of the hero, who used to think he is all alone on a miniature size earth like planet, until one day, he discovers some unusual creatures, who are trying to take-over his planet by conquering each island one after another, and therefore, now it's up to "iZ" to save his planet from those evil beings.
